div.p: Impacts of emission pulses of CH 4 and CO 2. Radiative forcing (a), temperature (b), damages (c), and discounted damages (3 %, a) for an emission pulse of 28.3MT CH 4 (10 ppb in the first year) and 24.8 times as much CO 2 emissions by mass. The underlying scenario is RCP6.0, with other parameters at their central values.
